title: Drawing, "Helena Rubinstein Apartment: Chest:, Three Drawers, Low, Recangular Pulls, Off-Center, One per Drawer", 1930
medium: Graphite and red color pencil on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamped in black ink at upper left: DONALD DESKEY/ ASSOCIATES
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower right: Scale; [Deskey #] 7401/ A; in red color pencil, P
description: Dresser of three drawers for Helena Rubinstein apartment. Rectinilear on left side, curved on right with panel of a lighter material around right side. Long, rectangular pulls, rounded on left side.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Helena Rubinstein Apartment: Chest:, Three Drawers, Low, Recangular Pulls, Off-Center, One per Drawer", 1930.
1930. Graphite and red color pencil on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-1795.
